DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: This study includes 10 paired samples of Korean AML paitients.10 AML tumor samples are paired with each normal(Saliva or BM derived) sequencing data.The results of this WGS study were analyzed by Mutect and GATK for ranking germline variants and cancer variants to make mutational profile matrix.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: This study includes 10 paired samples of Korean AML paitients.10 AML tumor samples are paired with each normal(Saliva or BM derived) sequencing data.The results of this WGS study were analyzed by Mutect and GATK for ranking germline variants and cancer variants to make mutational profile matrix.
